channel.title: Barrows Problem
channel.description: Everything works except I want to make my game like runekeep were you get barrows points from killing barrows npcs or like the chest idea were you get runes, money, and a random piece of barrows armor. I'm trying to base it off of runescape directly except for the whole tunnel route thing just a random chest in the middle, and like a barrows monster drops a key but like a drop. I really think the Barrows points is an easy way for me but on the coding end I wouldn't know were to start if someone could make me a tut even would be cool. Anyone have any ideas?

item.title: Barrows Problem
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

You would need to write the kills to your character files

example…

You’d need to declare…

public int ahrimKills;

Add this with the others

} else if (token.equals("character-ahrimKills")) { ahrimKills = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Add this with the others

characterfile.write("character-ahrimKills = ", 0, 16); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(ahrimKills), 0, Integer.toString(ahrimKills).length()); characterfile.newLine();

And make it check for kills on the object

if(ObjectID == ChestID && ahrimKills == 1){ addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 100);
sendMessage(“You receive your reward!!”)
}
else if(ObjectID == ChestID && ahrimKills < 1){
sendMessage("You need to kill the barrows brother before claiming your reward!!):
}

Read full topic
